_meanings:
{@--1@} A flag, banner (<ab>fig.</ab>
also); {#yaM kAmamaMjarI kAmayate sa haratu#} 
{#suBagapatAkAM#} <ls>Dk. 47</ls> ‘let him carry
the palm of beauty or good fortune’.

{@--4@} An episode or
episodical incident in a drama, see
{#patAkAsTAnaka#} below.

(in 
dramaturgy) intimation of an 
episodical incident, when instead of the
thing thought of or expected, 
another of the same character is
brought in by some unexpected 
circumstance; ({#yatrArTe ciMtite'#} 
{#nyasmiMstalliMgo'nyaH prayujyate . AgaMtukena BAvena#}
{#patAkAsTAnakaM tu tat ..#} <ls>S. D. 299</ls>;
for its different kinds, see <ls n="S. D.">300</ls>
<ls n="S. D.">304</ls>).
